title: Did the protesters against Antiva in Craigslist in Nebraska recruit?
subtitle: "We're against FA, and we're willing to pay up to 1,000 people $25 an hour to protestors," said one ad.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Antiva posted an announcement on Lincoln, Nebraska, Craigslist's website offering a push for protesters "to cause as much chaos and destruction as possible."
